A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie is absolutely trash on so many levels. They have killed star wars\, I will never pay to see another one.

The visuals and sound are good\, but that counts for nothing\, that is par for the course for any modern action movie.

The plot of this movie is boring\, absurd\, and full of so many plot holes and bad lines it is impossible to comprehend how the script was approved.

In addition the film failed to pursue any of the established story lines in favor of pushing Rian Johnson's self important themes. That's not subversion\, that's not creativity\, that's not being bold\, it's lazy writing\, it's TRASH.

On top of all that old characters and themes have been disrespected beyond repair. The arrogance of these people\, to trash the characters and themes that are the ONLY things getting the audience to the theatre. I will never watch anything related to Rian Johnson again.
